description: This file is a Node.js script that performs a non-destructive connectivity check for the Supabase Admin API using the service role key. It verifies environment variables, initializes a Supabase client, and attempts to list users to confirm API access.

methods.name: exitWith
methods.description: Function to log success or error messages and exit the process with the specified code.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main asynchronous function that performs the connectivity check by calling the Supabase Admin API.
